option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: postgres: image: postgres:15 container_name: budgetbites-postgres environment: POSTGRES_DB: budgetbites POSTGRES_USER: admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password ports: - "5332:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data restart: unless-stopped
maildev: image: maildev/maildev container_name: budgetbites-maildev ports: - "1080:1080" # Web interface - "1025:1025" # SMTP server restart: unless-stopped
volumes: postgres_data:

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
<parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>3.2.5</version> <relativePath/> </parent>
<groupId>com.example</groupId> <artifactId>BudgetBites</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>BudgetBites</name> <description>BudgetBites</description>
<properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties>
<dependencies> <!-- Core Spring Boot --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Email support --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-mail</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Persistence --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- PostgreSQL JDBC driver --> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> </dependency>
<!-- Testing --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-security</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.security</groupId> <artifactId>spring-security-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin> </plugins> </build> </project>
